title: Leisure lines
creator_credit: Terry Jennings, South Australian Film Corporation and New Films
brief_description: Leisure and recreation are becoming increasingly important to people in the community. Its important that there be some physical side to it and also enjoyment and relaxation. In addition, as this film points out, good facilities and community organisations are required to help people make the most of their leisuretime. Produced for the South Australian Department of Tourism, Recreation and Sport.
